tool_description: Simple-yet-powerful mortgage calculator for home financing. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/mortgagecalculator.
name: Mortgage Calculator by API-Ninjas
title: Mortgage Calculator by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/mortgagecalculator
api_list.description: API Ninjas Mortgage Calculator API endpoint. Either **loan_amount** or (**home_value** + **downpayment**) parameters must be set.

required_parameters.name: interest_rate
required_parameters.description: annual interest rate (in %). For example, a 3.5% interest rate would be 3.5. Cannot exceed 10000.

optional_parameters.name: downpayment
optional_parameters.description: downpayment on the home or asset. Cannot exceed home_value.

optional_parameters.name: home_value
optional_parameters.description: total value of the home or asset. Must be greater than downpayment.

optional_parameters.name: duration_years
optional_parameters.description: duration of the loan in years. Must be between 1 and 10000. If not set, default value is 30 years.
